alert.note: Alert for Madison; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 7:00AM CDT until June 25 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Madison County in south central Iowa... Northwestern Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 745 AM CDT. * At 659 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Winterset, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Winterset and Winterset-Madison County Airport around 705 AM CDT. Patterson around 715 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bevington, Martensdale, Cumming, Spring Hill, Norwalk and Indianola. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 56 and 65. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
